arts.ttl: Rose reflects on Augsburg draw: "We're not happy with the result"
arts.sum: Marco Rose wasn't happy with the result after Leipzig drew 0-0 with Augsburg.

arts.ttl: Augsburg and RB Leipzig battle to goalless draw
arts.sum: As the half progressed, the match developed into a tactical battle, with Augsburg's compact defence holding firm against Leipzig's probing attacks. Augsburg and RB Leipzig played out a goalless draw in an evenly balanced Matchday 22 encounter in which both teams created chances but failed to find the breakthrough.

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. RB Leipzig preview: Die Roten Bullen continue UCL push
arts.sum: RB Leipzig will continue their bid to secure Champions League qualification when they travel to the WWK Arena for Friday’s clash with Augsburg.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig hope to sell Benjamin Seško for €100m in the summer
arts.sum: Sport Bild reports that RB Leipzig will hope to sell striker Benjamin Seško for around €100m this summer if the Slovenian leaves. Seško extended his contract at the Red Bull Arena…

arts.ttl: Preview: Augsburg vs. RB Leipzig - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and RB Leipzig, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
